description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sign up to Bomber Boing championship, where strange creatures fight with no mercy for victory. Destroy the floor to finish with your rivals through its 30 scenarios with many different conditions. Ideal for playing with family, friends, or anyone with its online mode for Xbox Live!. Amazing music for an atypical and very funny game. Ready...GO! (Version 1.0.0.0)
